name: Box Jump
summary: Stand in front of a sturdy box or platform with feet shoulder-width apart.
Bend your knees and swing your arms back to prepare for the jump.
Explode upward, swinging your arms forward as you jump onto the box.
Land softly on the box with knees slightly bent and feet flat.
Step or jump back down to the floor and repeat.

name: Box Squat (Barbell)
summary: Set a box or bench behind you and position a barbell on your upper back.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly turned out.
Lower your hips back and down until you sit briefly on the box.
Drive through your heels to return to the standing position.
Repeat while keeping your chest up and back straight.

name: Box Squat (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides and stand in front of a box.
Lower yourself back and down until you sit briefly on the box.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Keep your chest up and core engaged throughout the movement.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
summary: Stand a few feet in front of a bench and place one foot behind you on the bench.
Keep your front foot flat and your torso upright.
Lower your back knee toward the ground by bending your front leg.
Pause when your front thigh is parallel to the ground.
Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Complete the reps and switch legs.

name: Cable Pull Through
summary: Attach a rope handle to a low pulley and face away from the machine.
Straddle the rope and grab the handles between your legs.
Hinge at your hips and lower your torso while keeping your back flat.
Drive your hips forward and squeeze your glutes at the top.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.

name: Deadlift (Barbell)
summary: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and the barbell over your midfoot.
Bend at the hips and knees to grip the bar just outside your knees.
Keep your back flat and chest up as you pull the bar off the floor.
Stand up straight by driving through your heels and extending your hips.
Lower the bar with control back to the floor.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

name: Deadlift (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs with palms facing your body.
Stand with your feet hip-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells down the front of your legs.
Keep your back flat and chest up throughout the movement.
Return to standing by driving your hips forward.
Repeat for reps.

name: Deadlift (Smith Machine)
summary: Stand in front of a Smith machine with the bar at shin level.
Grip the bar with hands shoulder-width apart.
Lift the bar by driving through your heels and extending your hips.
Stand tall, then slowly lower the bar back down with control.
Repeat the motion while keeping your back flat.

name: Front Squat (Barbell)
summary: Position a barbell on the front of your shoulders with your elbows high.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly out.
Lower into a squat by bending your knees and hips.
Keep your chest up and elbows high throughout the movement.
Drive through your heels to return to standing.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

name: Goblet Squat (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell vertically at chest level with both hands.
Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly out.
Lower your body into a squat while keeping the dumbbell close to your chest.
Go as low as your mobility allows with a flat back.
Push through your heels to stand back up.
Repeat with control.

name: Hack Squat
summary: Position yourself on the hack squat machine with your shoulders under the pads.
Place your feet on the platform shoulder-width apart.
Unlock the safety handles and lower your body by bending your knees.
Stop when your thighs are about parallel to the platform.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Repeat for reps.

name: Hip Abductor (Machine)
summary: Sit on the machine and place your outer thighs against the pads.
Select a comfortable resistance and grip the handles for support.
Push your legs outward against the pads until fully abducted.
Pause briefly, then return to the starting position.
Repeat with control for the desired number of reps.

name: Hip Adductor (Machine)
summary: Sit on the machine and place your inner thighs against the pads.
Select an appropriate resistance and hold the handles.
Bring your legs together against the resistance.
Pause and squeeze your inner thighs at the top.
Slowly return to the start position.
Repeat for reps.

name: Hip Thrust (Barbell)
summary: Sit on the ground with your upper back against a bench and a barbell over your hips.
Roll the bar into position and plant your feet flat on the floor.
Drive through your heels to lift your hips up until your torso is parallel to the floor.
Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.
Lower your hips back down with control.
Repeat for reps.

name: Leg Extension (Machine)
summary: Sit on the leg extension machine with your feet under the padded lever.
Adjust the pad so it rests just above your ankles.
Grip the handles and keep your back flat against the seat.
Extend your legs by contracting your quadriceps.
Pause at the top, then slowly lower the weight.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.

name: Leg Press
summary: Sit on the leg press machine with your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Unlock the safety handles and lower the platform toward your chest by bending your knees.
Stop when your knees form about a 90-degree angle.
Push the platform back up through your heels.
Repeat with control for the desired reps.

name: Lunge (Barbell)
summary: Place a barbell on your upper back and stand tall with feet hip-width apart.
Step forward with one leg and lower your back knee toward the ground.
Keep your chest upright and front knee aligned with your foot.
Push through the front heel to return to standing.
Alternate legs and repeat.

name: Lunge (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides and stand upright.
Step forward with one leg and lower into a lunge.
Keep your front knee above your ankle and chest upright.
Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Repeat alternating legs.

name: Lying Leg Curl (Machine)
summary: Lie face down on the leg curl machine with your ankles under the pad.
Grip the handles and keep your hips flat against the bench.
Curl your legs up as far as possible by contracting your hamstrings.
Pause at the top, then lower the pad with control.
Repeat for reps.

name: Pistol Squat
summary: Stand on one leg with the other leg extended in front of you.
Hold your arms out for balance and keep your chest upright.
Lower yourself into a squat on the standing leg.
Go as low as your balance and mobility allow.
Push through your heel to return to standing.
Switch legs and repeat.

name: Romanian Deadlift (Barbell)
summary: Stand with your feet hip-width apart holding a barbell in front of your thighs.
Keep your knees slightly bent and your back flat.
Hinge at your hips and lower the bar down the front of your legs.
Go until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
Drive your hips forward to return to standing.
Repeat with control.

name: Romanian Deadlift (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs.
Keep your knees slightly bent and hinge at the hips.
Lower the dumbbells down the front of your legs while keeping your back flat.
Stop when you feel a hamstring stretch, then stand back up.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

name: Seated Calf Raise (Machine)
summary: Sit at the seated calf raise machine with the pads resting on your thighs.
Place the balls of your feet on the foot platform.
Raise your heels by pressing through your toes.
Pause at the top, then lower your heels below the platform level.
Repeat with controlled motion.

name: Seated Calf Raise (Plate Loaded)
summary: Sit on the plate-loaded calf raise machine with the weight loaded on the lever.
Place the balls of your feet on the platform and rest your thighs under the pads.
Raise your heels by pressing through your toes.
Pause, then slowly lower your heels down.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.

name: Seated Leg Curl (Machine)
summary: Sit on the leg curl machine with your ankles behind the padded lever.
Adjust the backrest and pad to fit your leg length.
Grip the handles and keep your upper body still.
Curl your legs back as far as possible.
Pause and return slowly to the start.
Repeat for reps.

name: Single Leg Calf Raise (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in one hand and stand on the opposite foot.
Place the ball of your foot on a raised platform or step.
Raise your heel as high as possible.
Pause at the top, then lower your heel below the step.
Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Squat (Barbell)
summary: Place a barbell on your upper back and stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Brace your core and lower your body by bending your hips and knees.
Go down until your thighs are at least parallel to the floor.
Push through your heels to return to standing.
Repeat with control.

name: Squat (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides or at shoulder height.
Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower into a squat while keeping your back straight and chest up.
Push through your heels to return to standing.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.

name: Squat (Bodyweight)
summary: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and arms extended in front of you.
Lower your hips by bending your knees while keeping your chest up.
Go as low as you can comfortably go.
Push through your heels to return to standing.
Repeat for reps.

name: Squat (Machine)
summary: Position yourself on the squat machine with shoulders under the pads.
Place your feet flat on the platform.
Lower yourself by bending your knees and hips.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Repeat while maintaining control.

name: Squat (Smith Machine)
summary: Stand under the bar of a Smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Unrack the bar and lower into a squat while keeping your back straight.
Stop when your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Push through your heels to return to standing.
Repeat for reps.

name: Standing Calf Raise (Barbell)
summary: Place a barbell on your upper back and stand on the edge of a step.
Let your heels hang off the edge and keep your legs straight.
Raise your heels as high as possible by contracting your calves.
Pause at the top, then lower your heels below the step.
Repeat with control.

name: Standing Calf Raise (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in one or both hands and stand with the balls of your feet on a step.
Let your heels hang off the edge.
Raise your heels as high as you can.
Pause, then lower your heels below the platform.
Repeat for reps.

name: Standing Calf Raise (Machine)
summary: Step into the standing calf raise machine with the pads on your shoulders.
Place the balls of your feet on the platform and let your heels hang.
Raise your heels by pressing through your toes.
Pause at the top, then lower with control.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.

name: Standing Calf Raise (Smith Machine)
summary: Stand under the bar of a Smith machine with your shoulders supporting it.
Place the balls of your feet on a raised surface.
Raise your heels by extending your ankles.
Pause at the top, then lower your heels down.
Repeat for reps.

name: Stiff Leg Deadlift (Barbell)
summary: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hold a barbell in front of your thighs.
Keep your knees straight or slightly bent.
Hinge at the hips and lower the bar down your legs while keeping your back flat.
Stop when you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
Return to the top by driving your hips forward.
Repeat.

name: Stiff Leg Deadlift (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs.
Keep your legs straight or slightly bent and your back flat.
Hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells down the front of your legs.
Stop when your hamstrings are fully stretched.
Drive your hips forward to return to standing.
Repeat with control.

name: Trap Bar Deadlift
summary: Step inside a trap bar and grip the handles on both sides.
Stand with feet hip-width apart and back flat.
Drive through your heels to lift the bar by extending your hips and knees.
Stand tall at the top, then lower the bar back down.
Repeat while maintaining good form.

name: Zercher Squat (Barbell)
summary: Hold a barbell in the crook of your elbows and stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Keep your elbows tight to your body and chest up.
Lower into a squat by bending your knees and hips.
Go down until your thighs are at least parallel to the ground.
Push through your heels to return to standing.
Repeat with control.
